init.characterSays: Attention citizens. The King declares that the Princess is to be wed to the Prince of Fray, strengthening the strongest alliance in the Realm.

after_herald.characterSays: That damn king. That bastard. He won't get away with this.

what_happened.characterSays: She was as beautiful as the moon. I took her hand and we danced and talked for hours.

what_happened_next.characterSays: The king demanded I remove my mask. When my identity was revealed, he insulted me in front of the entire nobility of Notting.

why_insult.characterSays: He called me a fool to think the princess could love a merchant. Despite all my wealth, without much land I am nothing to those people.

responses.text: I'm sorry that happened to you

sorry_that_happened.characterSays: It is for the best. Here's your reward. I am thankful to now know what I must do.

responses.text: What are you going to do?

reward.characterSays: Oh of course. Here you go. Thank you for your help. I now know what must be done.

responses.text: What are you going to do?

what_will_you_do.characterSays: It's best if you didn't know. As a matter of fact, if anybody asks about me, we've never met.
